name: emfibben
description: A template for kick starting a Cloudflare Workers project

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src trzeci/emscripten emcc -Oz -s WASM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s DYNAMIC_EXECUTION=0 -s TEXTDECODER=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s ENVIRONMENT='web' -s 'EXPORT_NAME="emscripten"' --pre-js './pre.js' -o ./build/module.js ./src/fibonacci.c

author: Matthew Alonso <granjef3@gmail.com>
